header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Experiences, Celebrities, Work, Other family members, Living arrangements, Internet, Other people, university.
header.activity: Friends talking about their current and future situations
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes
